long_description: Using incredibly strong vacuum pads for attachment, the SeaSucker Talon Bike Rack temporarily mounts a single bike to the roof of your car without the hassle of permanently installing hardware. Easy to mount, nonmarking, UV and weather resistant, the SeaSucker Talon uses multiple vacuum cups to hold exceptionally well to glass or metal surfaces. 2-part rack includes a front mount with vacuum pads for the fork of the bike, and a separate mount with vacuum pads to secure the rear wheel. Integrated vacuum pumps seal the cups to your vehicle; recommended for roof top, trunk or hatchback attachment. Thick, high-density polyethylene body offers excellent strength and durability. Heavy-duty fork mount for 9mm dropouts secures a single bike up to 45 lbs. Includes the Talon bike rack, a rear wheel strap, 5g Lube Tube for vacuum pump maintenance and a spare SeaSucker vacuum pad and pump.
short_description: Using incredibly strong vacuum pads for attachment, the SeaSucker Talon Bike Rack temporarily mounts a single bike to the roof of your car without the hassle of permanently installing hardware.
